Description: Glazed steatite plaque, longitudinally pierced, one side decorated with representation of an ibex, other side decorated with depiction of hunting scene.
Curator's comments: An exact parallel to this piece is provided by BM 1888,0601.70. Bibliography: Gardner, E. A. 1888, Naukratis. Part II (Sixth Memoir of the Egypt Exploration Fund), London, Pl. XVIII, 67. Jaeger, B. 1982, Essai de classification et datation des scarabées Menkhéperrê. Fribourg, § 492.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev George Denis Nash
